tp.pr5.console

Class ConsoleController

  • java.lang.Object
    • tp.pr5.Controller
      • tp.pr5.console.ConsoleController

  • public class ConsoleController
extends Controller
    The controller employed when the application is configured as a console application. It contains the simulation loop that executes the instructions written by the user on the console.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ConsoleController(RobotEngine game)
      Constructor of the controller.

      • ConsoleController

        public ConsoleController(RobotEngine game)

        Parameters:
        game - Game that is being played.

    • Method Detail

      • startController

        public void startController()
        This function implements the main loop of the simulation. Basically, it reads a line, the interpreter generates the corresponding instruction and executes it. The simulation finishes when the robot arrives at the space ship, the user types "QUIT", or the robot runs out of fuel If the input string has a wrong format, this method will request the robot engine to notify that an error has ocurred This method must be called once.
        Specified by:
        startController in class Controller

      • executeCommand

        public boolean executeCommand(java.lang.String command)
                       throws WrongInstructionFormatException
        This method implements the command execution. The string is parsed and the resulting command is executed in the game. After command execution, it checks if the game has finished
        Parameters:
        command - The string that probably contains a command
        Returns:
        true if the command execution raises the end of the game.
        Throws:
        WrongCommandFormatException - If the parameter does not represent a valid command
        WrongInstructionFormatException
